briefdescription.para: Escaping quote characters by use two quotes for every one displayed.

simplesect.para: Returns a string representing the escaped value.

briefdescription.para: Gets the database management system that is used with conjunction of the source .

simplesect.para: The DBMS enumeration value.

briefdescription.para: Finds the IDomain that equals the specified domainName using a non case sensitive comparison.

simplesect.para: Returns a IDomain representing the domain with the given name; otherwise null.

briefdescription.para: Gets all of the IDomain values that have been configured in the workspace.

simplesect.para: Returns a IEnumerable<IDomain> representing the domains available; otherwise null.

memberdef.argsstring: (this IWorkspace source, esriEditDataChangesType editDataChangesType, Func< string, bool > func, Predicate< DifferenceRow > predicate, params esriDifferenceType[] differenceTypes)
memberdef.name: GetEditChanges

briefdescription.para: Gets the changes (or edits) that have been made in the current edit session.

parameterdescription.para: Type of the edit data changes.
The function used to determine if the differences should be determined for the specified table.
The predicate used to determine if the differences are returned.

simplesect.para: Returns a Dictionary<TKey,TValue> representing the differences for the table (or key).

parameterdescription.para: The workspace must be within an edit session in order to determine the edit changes.

memberdef.argsstring: (this IWorkspace source, string schemaName, string tableName)
memberdef.name: GetFeatureClass

briefdescription.para: Finds the IFeatureClass with the specified tableName in the schemaName that resides within the specified source workspace.

simplesect.para: Returns a IFeatureClass representing the feature class that has the name, otherwise null.

briefdescription.para: Gets all of the feature classes in the workspace.

simplesect.para: Returns a IEnumerable<IFeatureClass> representing the feature classes.

briefdescription.para: Gets the formatted date time for the workspace.

simplesect.para: Returns String representing the formatted date time for the workspace.

briefdescription.para: Gets the name of the SQL function.

simplesect.para: Returns a string representing the name of the function.

memberdef.argsstring: (this IWorkspace source, string schemaName, string relationshipName)
memberdef.name: GetRelationshipClass

briefdescription.para: Finds the IRelationshipClass with the specified relationshipName in the schemaName that resides within the specified source workspace.

simplesect.para: Returns a IRelationshipClass representing the relationship that has the name, otherwise null.

briefdescription.para: Gets all of the feature classes in the workspace.

simplesect.para: Returns a IEnumerable<IFeatureClass> representing the feature classes.

memberdef.argsstring: (this IWorkspace source, string schemaName, string tableName)
memberdef.name: GetTable

briefdescription.para: Finds the ITable with the specified tableName in the schemaName that resides within the specified source workspace.

simplesect.para: Returns a ITable representing the table that has the name, otherwise null.

briefdescription.para: Gets all of the tables in the workspace.

simplesect.para: Returns a IEnumerable<ITable> representing the feature classes.

briefdescription.para: Determines whether the specified workspace is the database system.

simplesect.para: Returns a bool representing true if the specified workspace is DBMS; otherwise, false.

briefdescription.para: Determines whether the predicate is supported by the workspace.

simplesect.para: Returns the bool representing true when the predicate is supported; otherwise false

memberdef.argsstring: (this IWorkspace source, Func< bool > operation, bool withUndoRedo=true, esriMultiuserEditSessionMode multiuserEditSessionMode=esriMultiuserEditSessionMode.esriMESMVersioned)
memberdef.name: PerformOperation

briefdescription.para: Encapsulates the operation by the necessary start and stop edit constructs using the specified withUndoRedo and multiuserEditSessionMode parameters.

parameterdescription.para: The edit operation delegate that handles making the necessary edits. When the delegate returns true the edits will be saved; otherwise they will not be saved.
if set to true when the changes are reverted when the edits are aborted.
The edit session mode that can be used to indicate non-versioned or versioned editing for workspaces that support multiuser editing.

simplesect.para: Returns a bool representing the state of the operation.

parameterdescription.para: The workspace does not support the edit session mode.;multiuserEditSessionMode

briefdescription.para: Updates the Multiversioned views to point to the current version.

detaileddescription.para: Before issuing any queries against the view, you must ensure that they will take place against the correct version.

briefdescription.para: Starts editing the workspace using the specified withUndoRedo and multiuserEditSessionMode parameters.

parameterdescription.para: if set to true when the changes are reverted when the edits are aborted.
The edit session mode that can be used to indicate non-versioned or versioned editing for workspaces that support multiuser editing.

simplesect.para: Returns a IEditableWorkspace respresenting an editable workspace (that is disposable).

parameterdescription.para: The workspace does not support the edit session mode.;multiuserEditSessionMode

detaileddescription.para: The IEditableWorkspace implements the IDisposable interface, meaning it should be used within a using statement.

briefdescription.para: Provides extension methods for the ESRI.ArcGIS.Geodatabase.IWorkspace interface.
